metadata.title: CVE-2024-56667 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/i915: Fix NULL pointer dereference in capture_engineWhen the intel_context structure contains NULL,it raises a NULL pointer dereference error in drm_info().(cherry picked from commit 754302a5bc1bd8fd3b7d85c168b0a1af6d4bba4d)

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
